## Toolbox.isHorizontal() method

Gets whether or not the toolbox is horizontal.  True if the toolbox is horizontal, false if the toolbox is vertical.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isHorizontal(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
